resources.string: Don\'t lose the spark that makes u you
If you want change you have to invite chaos
As lost as Alice as lost as Hatter
Some things can only burn and not turn into ashes
If it does not open, it\'s not your door
You control your destiny you don\'t need magic to do it
Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one remembers to turn on the light.
Don\'t wish for it Work for it
